snippet: Saudi Aramco's listing process is going as planned, and is expected to take place in the second half of 2018, Chief Executive Amin Nasser said on Monday....

headline.main: Senate to Consider Repeal of Obama-Era Labor Rule
headline.print_headline: Senate to Consider Repeal of Obama-Era Labor Rule

lead_paragraph: Saudi Aramco's listing process is going as planned, and is expected to take place in the second half of 2018, Chief Executive Amin Nasser said on Monday.
